metadata.name: Perpetual Ownership and Digital Economy (PODE) NFT
metadata.description: PODE is a Non-transferable, Non-tradeable DIGITALAX Utility NFT. PODE acts as proof of ownership for DIGITALAX's digital experiences, digital economies and digital networks. PODE holders will enjoy lifetime airdrops of exclusive and non-exclusive digital assets, digital contracts and perpetual rewards, which are transferable and tradable. PODE will act as a wallet and custody for you to receive and hold all of your digital assets, digital contracts, all in one place.
